1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.9a:
Yet again more integrations for aether
Made several of the progress bars have a color
Added Thaumcraft foci for the size module
Added Thaumcraft aspects to a handful of items and blocks
Fixed a few broken config options
Fixed incorrect pixie dust count display in pixie dust collector
Fixed a small issue with Thaumcraft/JER integration
Removed several duplicate recipe registrations
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.8b:
Fixed another crash
Music Player and Kobold Ring can now be equipped in Aether accessory slots
More aether accessories
Made smaller sizes in size module feel better
A lot of fixes and minor improvements
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.8a:
Added support for Aether and some of its addons
Fixed a bug with Thermal Expansion Ancient Tome crafting
Some changes and fixes to size module
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.7b:
Fixed crash without ArtemisLib installed
Improvements to the size module
Fixed Harvestcraft squid drop
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.7a:
Added support for more recent Future MC versions
Added and updated some Future MC integrations
Experimental entity and player size change module (disabled by default)
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.6b:
Fixed Ice and Fire crash
Added Chisel integration with Ice and Fire
Updated existing Ice and Fire integrations
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.6a:
Added Industrial Foregoing integrations
A few minor fixes and improvements
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.5c:
